![Image 80](https://spotler.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/spotler-hero-image-mailplus.webp)

Advanced email marketing software
---------------------------------

Do you want to communicate with customers, members, prospects and other target groups in a professional manner? Then Spotler Mail+ is the right choice! Spotler Mail+ is user-friendly software for email marketing automation.

With Spotler Mail+ you can send beautiful newsletters, you can easily set up automatic email campaigns with our smart automation editor and you can connect many well-known business software.

[More information about Spotler Mail+](https://spotler.com/en-de/mailplus)

Request a quote
---------------

Are you curious about what Spotler Mail+ can do for you and what the exact costs are for your situation? We have a suitable price plan for every organisation.

[Request a quote](https://spotler.com/en-de/quotation)

Start worry-free with Spotler Mail+
-----------------------------------

If you choose Spotler Mail+, you choose much more than just user-friendly software. You also choose all services that support you to make email marketing a success. Our support:

1

### Create and set up an account

2

### Template design and conversion

3

### Integration with CRM, CDP or webshop

4

### Training in using Spotler Mail+

5

### Learn everything about email marketing in Spotler Academy

6

### Telephone support for all your questions

Depending on your wishes, additional costs may be charged for your template. You can create a template in your own corporate identity free of charge. Do you have specific design wishes? Then we are happy to design special content blocks or a completely tailor-made template for you. The costs for this are calculated separately because the wishes vary greatly per customer.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

#### Can the subscription be canceled monthly?

No, at Spotler we use annual licenses. The subscription will only start after you have agreed to the quote. You can cancel the current subscription up to one month before the subscription expires.

#### Do I pay monthly or annually?

Billing is per year. So you pay the annual amount of the chosen subscription for the subscription. The amount for one-off costs (templates, connection setup) will be invoiced 14 days after signing the proposal.

#### Which payment method do you use?

We will send an invoice for payment. You can make the payment by bank transfer.

#### Can I try Spotler Mail+ first?

Yes, you can try Spotler Mail+. We would first like to give you an [online demonstration](https://spotler.com/en-de/demo) in which we will go through all the functions of the software with you. You will then retain access to the demo account for a week to familiarize yourself with our software.

#### Is Spotler Mail+ also available in another language?

Yes. Spotler Mail+ is now available and usable in two languages: English and Dutch. The [Spotler Help Center](https://helpcenter.spotler.nl/hc/en-us) is available in two languages: English and Dutch.

#### Will we receive training in using Spotler Mail+?

Every setup of a Spotler account includes product training. You will, among other things, draw up a newsletter, analyze the results and practice with online forms.

#### Is my data safe?

Spotler is not only the best choice for professional email marketing automation, but also the **most secure choice**. Spotler is ISO-27001 certified, which guarantees a high level of information security for customers. At Spotler you can be assured that you are dealing with:

*   Secure sending of (customer) data
*   Log in more securely via two-step verification
*   Exchanging customer data via a secure environment
*   Automatic anti-bot protection web forms
*   Data storage on Dutch soil
*   Extensive measures against data leaks

#### Does Spotler have an partner program?

Yes, Spotler likes to work with partners to help customers succeed with email marketing. [Get in touch](https://spotler.com/en-de/contact) so we can tell you everything about are partner program.

**Do you have any other questions?**  
Please feel free to [contact](https://spotler.com/en-de/contact) or [schedule a demonstration](https://spotler.com/en-de/demo). Then we will answer all your questions.

Want to see Spotler Mail+?  
Schedule a demo!
---------------------------------------------

Would you like to see what Spotler Mail+ has to offer? Curious about the possibilities for your organization? Then immediately schedule a [demo](https://spotler.com/en-de/demo) with one of our experts.

We will show you our software and explain what a possible collaboration with Spotler would look like. Interactive and without any obligation!

[Schedule a demo](https://spotler.com/en-de/demo)

This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

More than just software
-----------------------

At Spotler we believe software should be designed to be user-friendly and accessible, ensuring that you can confidently navigate and utilise them right out of the box. To enhance your experience and maximise the software’s potential, we also offer a range of professional services. These services include comprehensive training and ongoing technical support to address any questions or challenges that may arise.
